attributes.action: Resign and his Government, through lack of public support in their policies on law and order
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present Government has failed in its policies to tackle law and order, crime, protection of the armed forces, and its volunteers, the NHS crisis, Fire service, and prison service, and its implementation and control of Human rights. We the citizens of this country hereby respectfully request that the Prime minister, and his cabinet resign forthwith, and call a general election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
